1 - about NAMESPACE:-
2 - about STRUCT:-Use a struct when you need to store elements of different data types under one data type.
-C++ structs are a value type rather than being a reference type. Use a struct if you don't intend to modify your data after creation.
when should we use STRUCT instead of CLASS?
-we can keep any type of data structure in out structure like array, integer, double etc.

4 - ITRATORS :-
